name: Shooter's Lair
description:
This is a time-consuming effort to make your eyes bleed. We've got it all : 

- Strong enemies ranging from hard to nightmarish
- Different moving patterns
- Fast-moving laser beams
- Upgrades that should theoritically make your life easier (or do they?)
- Cool music from an even cooler dude on youtube
- A glorious 800*600 display coupled with retro pixel-art graphics
- A ridiculously hard boss battle
- What are checkpoints?
A game project from Nicolas and Théodore. No refunds. Salt provided.
